name: Hydrofool
overview: Fresh from his dismal triumph on Knutz Folly, Sweevo is thrust into the watery world of DEATHBOWL, a planet which, for no good reason, has been converted into a gigantic aquarium. Will Sweevo succeed in his mysterious mission - or will the Great Bowl-Keeper pull the plug on him? HYDROFOOL is a fast, 3-D, seek, chase, puzzle and laugh game, featuring the fabulous but irrelevant HYDROMATION.
